21401.title: Outside the entrance to a cave
21401.description:
The limestone archway is twelve feet across and ten feet high with a
faintly perceptible passage leading inwards.  From a side glance, the
stone formation appears to be a domelike structure; the top portion
slants downwards, sinking heavily into the earth, instead of continuing
straight further down the back.  A thick cloud of rubble, dirt, sand,
and plant debris partly conceals the narrow aperture of this rockpile,
an entrance to the subterranean depths within. The cold, damp air
originating from inside the structure is seemingly inviting and a
comforting means of escape from the excessively dry and humid
surroundings of the expanse northwards.  A stone 'monolith' formed
from lava rock with 'writing' upon it stands near the passageway.

extras.description: Pledge eternal loyalty to what you believe.

21402.title: Within the cave
21402.description:
The surrounding walls and ceiling are made of solid limestone rock and
curve naturally towards the center; their surfaces are mostly smooth
except for some rough patches where algae has grown in sporadic spots,
giving the cave-wall a dull, almost sickly-green coloration.  The ground
here is flat but slopes slightly such that keeping one's balance and
going forward with ease could become problematic for most creatures.
Water droplets splatter from the ceiling to the lower reaches and finally
unto the floor beneath, making the traverse more difficult.  Some beaten
tracks of a four-legged animal could be seen here going further southwards.
An occasional arthropod saunters about.  It is unusually quiet.

21403.title: Center Womb
21403.description:
The interior is dimmer than in the room close to the entrance; sunlight
is non-existent here, reducing visibility for most creatures.  There are
some dark spots in the ceiling where the limestone seems almost black
with soot, and some parts where the glittering water droplets provide
an eerie lighting to the gloomy surroundings.  The cave interior starts
to narrow as sharp rocks jut out from every corner.  Halfway down the
cavern hefty boulders converge from opposing sides towards the center.
The silty ground further slopes to a decline, allowing liquids to spiral
downwards and accumulate into a filthy pool.  The large crevices on the
rectangular rock columns to the left and right of you, close to the cave-
wall, seem passable.

21404.title: Eastern Womb
21404.description:
The rock column opens up to reveal another dimly-lit yet spacious cavern
within the desolate cave. Several butchered carcasses are partly dug into
the ground, a form of ritual burial gone awry. A scant few of the remains
are intact; some bones are smashed into tiny pieces by a blunt force, the
majority with obvious chew-marks. Distinct impressions on the guano-filled
cave floor indicate plenty of scuffles have occurred here. The mucky ground
here slopes downward in a similar fashion to other caverns of this level.
There is a rustling in the nearby alcove.

21405.title: Western Womb
21405.description:
Upon entering, the squalid surroundings are immediately noticeable.
Squishy and slimy animal droppings are scattered all throughout the
walls and on the cave floor, making trekking by foot an unpleasant
experience for most creatures.  A single pillar standing boldly in
the middle of the hollow cavern diverts one's attention from the dingy
walls.  Of remarkable height, the majestic stalagmite formation made
of calcite, iron and water stretches from the soiled cave floor to
the domed ceiling.  There is something captivating in the way its
translucence is tainted by the reddish-brown streaks that cover the
structure like smears of dried blood.  A din of echoes could be heard
here.

21406.title: The Merchant's Lair
21406.description:
This small alcove houses several wooden shelves filled with random
items.  The reddish-brown limestone walls connect with the cleft
passage northwards.  The sediment accumulated on the floor of this
chamber is littered with fossilized bat droppings and animal remains.
The ceiling lined with needle-like crystals sags slightly due to the
stress caused by the downward incline of the entire cavern, making
this alcove a precarious spot for those who linger.
An agitated thrall merchant stands behind a small cabinet.

21407.title: The Torture Chamber
21407.description:
Reddish specks of light from an unknown source flicker in the cavern,
darting from one portion of the cavern to the other. The floor here
is a large iron grate and littered with maggots and rotting matter.
Numerous implements of torture are scattered about in disarray.  Within
the dim light you notice several creatures staring back at you languidly...
some not at all.  There are hairy chunks of flesh dangling from the
ceiling on hooks supported by chains.  The walls radiate with evil and
pulsate red with your every heartbeat. The walls, made of solid black
glass, have protruding spikes to keep you from even thinking of going
anywhere.  The chamber is filled with the sound of rain as the blood
falls through the grate into the room below.

21408.title: The Ancient Library
21408.description:
Piles of ancient tomes are scattered about this room. With a closer
look, they all appear to be transparent, as if the books themselves
were ghosts.  Though you may not be able to touch the books, the titles
send chills down your spine.  Many of the books before you are long lost
wizard tomes, as well as legendary rites that describe how to summon
demons of all sorts.  The librarian, an undead being herself, smiles
gently as she closes one of the ghostly tomes and looks up at you.
Without a word, she points to a sign on the wall.

extras.description:
The sign reads,
' To check out a book, say the name of the book
and the librarian will get it for you. '
' Currently Available Books:  '
Book of Ancient

21409.title: The Inner Sanctuary
21409.description:
The first thing that catches your eye in this room is the round, sunken
ceremonial crypt. Serpent-coiled jasper columns surround the burial pit
next to an agate dome embedded all over with human skulls, animal bones
and fossilized excrement. Your eyes then notice that opposite of you,
across the circular crypt, is a large obsidian throne inlaid with numerous
gemstones. Brazen censers are suspended on iron chains, leaking vapours
that drool upon the floor and crawl like larvae to the alabaster base of
the hideous statue. The blood rains down from above, coating any and every
single thing in the room. Time moves here, slowly seeping into the future.

21426.title: A dark and peaceful place
21426.description:
Darkness... You are surrounded by darkness... It seems so peaceful here. So
peaceful and dark... Everything is dark, everything... It seems so peaceful,
so dark. You sense, however, that you are not alone. At the periphery of your
mind, you hear whispers. You cannot make out what they are saying, but you
hear them... and they seem disturbing. They interrupt your own thoughts and
break your own inner peace.  As your eyes grow used to the darkness, you look
around you, and you make out claw marks on the hard stone floor.  Your eyes
also see dark on dark, something dark upon the dark claw-marked floor...
something you cannot identify.  Upon that dark something, larvae are feasting.
The peace you felt is disturbed again. Perhaps you can get away, perhaps the
disturbance will be less if you move over there...
